member.name: T:WpfApplication.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WpfApplication.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WpfApplication.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WpfApplication.MainWindow
member.summary: WPF application to read and format data

member.name: M:WpfApplication.MainWindow.testButton_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Read a line of data entered by the user. Format the data and display the results in the formattedText TextBlock control

member.name: M:WpfApplication.MainWindow.Window_Loaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: After the window has loaded, read data from the standard input. Format each line and display the results in the formattedText TextBlock control.
